mods.abstract: $50 REWARD. ABSCONDED on the morning of the 28th April, a negro man named Alexander, commonly called Ellie, aged about 45 years, rather forbidding when spoken to. He is about 5 feet 8 inches in height, stout built with somewhat bandy legs. He took with him a variety of clothing and will most probably frequently change his dress. It is suppsed he embarked on the day above mentioned, on board of some steamboat bound up. The above reward will be paid for him if secured in any jail in the western country, or twenty dollars if in Louisiana or Mississippi. PETER LAIDLAW, New Orleans, may 2 The Natchez Daily Courier, the Daily Missouri Republican, the Louisville Journal, and the Cincinnati Daily Whig will please publish the above advertisement three times and send their bills for payment to the office of the True American at New Orleans.
